title: Jocko Podcast 131 w/ Echo Charles: How To Win With People You Don't Like
description:
Join the conversation on Twitter/Instagram:
@jockowillink @echocharles

0:00:00 - Opening.

0:00:16 - How to never get interrupted.

0:09:11 - Shouldn't your superiors take Extreme Ownership?

0:17:49 - Getting past plateaus in Jiu Jitsu.

0:23:31 - The Exception to "There are no bad teams, only bad leaders."

0:38:11 - How to win with people you don't like.

1:00:51 - How to get back into the swing of things after tragedy.

1:06:48 - Excerpt from Anthony Bourdain's book. 

1:14:00 - Support.

1:46:51 - Closing Gratitude.
